document_data.mainbody:
haulkonmere Villa was the home of the Phaulkon noble family located in Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The villa was composed of four buildings, each standing two or three stories tall.
Phaulkonmere Villa was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward within the Adventurers Quarter. The villa sat in the south section of the Adventurers Quarter on Snake Alley facing Kerrigans Court.
